trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Methuen
There were no other sightings in Methuen on or around April 18th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsReturning from Church Driving West on RT 213 in Methuen ma with 14 yr old daughter when i noticed a red beam of light from the clouds directly to the ground it lasted app 5 seconds at arms length it was the with of my pinky finger. 2 seconds after red beam of light i noticed what apeared to be a very bright white light approx 2000 feet of the ground it seemed to be approx 30 ft wide heading west they were not landing lights of an airplane as object was heading away from me!!!
Summary: Very bright red beam of light.
